00021     /* A stenographic decoder class
00022      *
00023      *  LoadBMP *l=new LoadBMP();
00024      *  l->decode();
00025      *
00026      *  cout << l->get1() << endl;
00027      *  cout << l->get2() << endl;
00028      *  cout << l->get3() << endl;
00029      *
00030      * The input BMP filename is designed by input.
00031      * Output is the filename of a temp file.
00032      */
00033 
00038     class LoadBMP{
00039     public:
00040       LoadBMP();
00041       ~LoadBMP();

00044 
00045       // Return the phrasepass for password hashsum
